aircraft.value: Medusa Strike - AC-2871-439 at Regional Depot-A

defect_observed.value: Fuselage skin crack propagation. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 30/12/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 02/01/2025 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 03/01/2025 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 06/01/2025 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 06/01/2025 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Fuselage skin crack propagation. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Thermal cycling induced solder joint failure in electronic assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Canopy System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
